name: Abatron
description: Abatron is a multiplayer action strategy shooter. It's galactic dominance with controlled combat. First build your base and troops in Commander mode. Then jump into any unit at any time in First Person or in Third Person mode and confront your enemy head on.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-Bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Windows 8, or Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
